FLOW.COMMENT: Get the name of the receiver

MAP.COMMENT: Get the name of the receiver

SEQUENCE.COMMENT: Try block - Try to send the document

INVOKE.COMMENT: Get the receiver's preferred protocol settings
Make the HTTP call to post the data

MAP.COMMENT: All OK. Return with a success status

INVOKE.COMMENT: Log the message in the TN Activity log

SEQUENCE.COMMENT: Send email and change document status

Values.value:
Error in delivering %bizdoc/DocType/TypeName% document with internal ID %bizdoc/InternalID%. The intended receiver was %receiverName%.
Time : %lastError/time% Service : %lastError/service% Error : %lastError/error% Dump : %lastError/errorDump%

INVOKE.COMMENT: Change the status of the document to FAILED
Log the message in the TN Activity log

Values.value: Document delivery failed. As all the delivery attempts have been exhausted, the document would have to be reprocessed to retry delivery.

INVOKE.COMMENT: More retries left. Change status of the document to PENDING.
Log the message in the TN Activity log

Values.value: Document delivery attempt failed. No action is required as there are still delivery attempts pending.
